settings_devMessage.message: I add new animations now and then when I have time. New animation suggestions are welcome, let me know in GitHub discussions.

settings_enabledSitesSubheading.message: In the text boxes you can add a comma-separated list of statuses/list names/column names that match what you call them in your software.

settings_settingHowOften.message: How often do you want to see a delight?

settings_chanceOfDelightHeading.message: How often do you want to be delighted?
